price: ߡߍ߲ ߣߊ߬ߣߍ߲߫ ߕߎ߬ߢߊ ߘߌ߫ ߞߵߊ߬ ߟߊߛߙߋߦߊ߫ ߏ߬ ߟߎ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߝߊ߲ߕߊ߲ߞߟߊ ߟߎ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߘߋ߬
arabic: وَٱلَّذِي جَآءَ بِٱلصِّدۡقِ وَصَدَّقَ بِهِۦٓ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُتَّقُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhī jāa bil-ṣid'qi waṣaddaqa bihi ulāika humu al-mutaqūna
